name: The Toy Exchange
overview:
Motto: “Play Smart!”

The Toy Exchange is a toy rental service whose primary business is to provide an alternate way to de-clutter your home of unwanted gently used toys at the same time helping you save money, while giving you access to a large inventory of toys at very good price.

The Toy Exchange offers parents an affordable way to provide hours of education and entertainment to their child without the expense of purchasing toys. We are positioning ourselves to be the worlds largest online toy rental service, offering a wide range of brand name toys for children ages 0 to 5 plus.

The Toy Exchange recognizes that many parents want their child to experience the learning opportunity and skill development that come through playing with a variety of toys. However, we also recognize that it is simply unnecessary to buy everything! Often times, a parent will purchase a toy for their child, only to find that within a few weeks or less the child is bored with that toy. Most parents respond to that boredom the only way they can, by purchasing more toys. Soon to find out that they have a room full of toys that are no longer of interest to their child.

The Toy Exchange solves those problems and more.
